title: Two ordinances of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled 26. July 1647.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Both signed: H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.

Ordinance of 23 July for settling of the militia revoked. The ordinance of 4 May 1647 to remain in force. Ordinance of 24 July declaring traitors those who get subscriptions to the engagement is null and void -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
